REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2006 reute r f BC-MINNTECH-<MNTX>-SEES 04-09 0067

TEXT.TITLE: MINNTECH <MNTX> SEES FIRST QUARTER LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Minntech Corp said it expects to report loss for its fiscal 1988 first quarter to end June 30, due to start-up costs related to a new membrane oxygenator and water filtration products. However, revenues and earnings should consistently increase throughout the remainder of the year, President Louis Cosentino told analysts. Reuter
